description.english: Hello, my friend. Stay awhile and listen

description.english: YOU CAN'T CUT BACK ON FUNDING! YOU WILL REGRET THIS!
description.french: YOU CAN'T CUT BACK ON FUNDING! YOU WILL REGRET THIS!
description.russian: ВЫ НЕ МОЖЕТЕ СОКРАТИТЬ ФИНАНСИРОВАНИЕ! ВЫ ПОЖАЛЕЕТЕ ОБ ЭТОМ!
description.spanish: ¡NO PUEDES RECORTAR LA FINANCIACIÓN!  TE ARREPENTIRÁS DE ESTO!!
description.turkish: YATIRIMI KESEMEZSİN! BUNU YAPTIĞINA PİŞMAN OLACAKSIN!
description.german: SIE KÖNNEN DIE FINANZIERUNG NICHT VERRINGERN! DAS WIRST DU BEREUEN!
description.schinese: 你不能缩减资金！！你会后悔的！！
description.japanese: YOU CAN'T CUT BACK ON FUNDING! YOU WILL REGRET THIS!(資金を削るな!後悔するぞ!)
description.thai: คุณไม่สามารถลดทุนได้! เสียใจกับคุณด้วย!
description.brazilian: VOCÊ NÃO PODE CORTAR NO FINANCIAMENTO! VOCÊ VAI SE ARREPENDER DISSO!
description.portuguese: NÃO SE PODE CORTAR NO FINANCIAMENTO! VAI-SE ARREPENDER DISTO!
description.italian: NON PUOI RIDURRE I FONDI! TE NE PENTIRAI!
description.dutch: JE KUNT NIET BEZUINIGEN! HIER KRIJG JE SPIJT VAN!
description.polish: NIE MOŻNA OGRANICZAĆ FINANSOWANIA! BĘDZIECIE TEGO ŻAŁOWAĆ!

displayName.thai: สร้างเกมดัง

description.english: Words have the power to both destroy and heal. When words are both true and kind, they can change our world.
description.french: Words have the power to both destroy and heal. When words are both true and kind, they can change our world.
description.russian: Слова обладают как разрушительной, так и исцеляющей силой. Когда слова правдивы и добры, они могут изменить наш мир.
description.spanish: Las palabras tienen el poder de destruir y sanar.  Cuando las palabras son verdaderas y amables, pueden cambiar nuestro mundo
description.turkish: Kelimelerin hem yok etme hem de iyileştirme gücü vardır. Kelimeler doğru ve nazik olunca, dünyayı değiştirebilirler.
description.german: Worte haben die Kraft, sowohl zu zerstören als auch zu heilen. Wenn Worte sowohl wahr als auch freundlich sind, können sie unsere Welt verändern.
description.koreana: 말은 파괴하는 힘도, 치유하는 힘도 있습니다. 진실되고 친절한 말은 우리 세상은 바뀔거에요.
description.schinese: 文字有摧毁和痊愈的力量。当文字充满了真诚的时候，他们可以改变我们的世界。
description.japanese: 言葉には破壊する力と癒す力がある。その言葉が真実で、優しいものであった場合、それは世界を変える力があるのだ。
description.thai: คำพูดนั้นมีพลังที่จะทำลายและรักษาได้ มีคำพูดทั้งจริงและใจดี ก็สามารถเปลี่ยนแปลงโลกของเราได้
description.brazilian: As palavras têm o poder de destruir e curar. Quando as palavras são verdadeiras e amáveis, elas podem mudar nosso mundo.
description.portuguese: As palavras têm o poder de destruir e curar. Quando as palavras são simultaneamente verdadeiras e amáveis, podem mudar o nosso mundo.
description.italian: Le parole hanno il potere di distruggere e di guarire. Quando le parole sono vere e gentili, possono cambiare il nostro mondo.
description.dutch: Woorden hebben de kracht om zowel te vernietigen als te genezen. Als woorden waar en aardig zijn, kunnen ze onze wereld veranderen.
description.polish: Słowa mają moc zarówno niszczenia, jak i uzdrawiania. Kiedy słowa są zarówno prawdziwe, jak i życzliwe, mogą zmienić nasz świat.

description.english: Science isn't about WHY, it's about WHY NOT!
description.french: Science isn't about WHY, it's about WHY NOT!
description.russian: Наука не терпит вопроса «почему?». Главный вопрос — «почему бы и нет?»
description.spanish: La ciencia no se trata del porque, se trata del porque no!
description.turkish: Bilim NEDEN ile değil, NEDEN DEĞİL ile ilgilidir!
description.german: In der Wissenschaft geht es nicht um WARUM, sondern um WARUM NICHT!
description.koreana: 과학은 '왜'에 대한 것이 아니라, '왜 안되는가'에 대한 것이다.
description.schinese: 科学不是在于为什么, 而是在于为什么不!
description.japanese: Science isn't about WHY, it's about WHY NOT!(科学は
description.thai: วิทยาศาสตร์ไม่ได้เกี่ยวกับทำไม แต่เกี่ยวกับทำไมไท่
description.brazilian: A ciência não se trata de PORQUÊ, mas sim de PORQUÊ NÃO!
description.portuguese: A ciência não se trata de PORQUÊ, mas sim de PORQUÊ NÃO!
description.italian: La scienza non riguarda il PERCHE', ma il PERCHE' NON!
description.dutch: Wetenschap gaat niet over WAAROM, maar over WAAROM NIET!
description.polish: Nauka nie jest od tego, DLACZEGO, ale od tego, DLACZEGO NIE!
